text: This is not just a showroom but also a â€˜museumâ€™, and not the typical cluttered â€˜garang kuni storeâ€™. Every vintage pieces were beautifully restored and curated. The staff were friendly and very happy to share their knowledge. There was no pressure to purchase anything and it was very nice chatting with them.

A place for reminiscing the past. Many item, big or small, will bring back memories. Slowly look around, don't know what things you will find. Very friendly owner & wife. Have pleasure talking to them.
My go to shop for rare vintage/antique. The people here are always helpful & friendly. Thank you for the wonderful experience. Do come here and visit, you won't regret it.

Visited Treasure At Home after seeing it on Instagram, it's filled with many beautiful pieces & run with lots of love, you can tell the staff care when you look at an item then they tell you all about it's history and their passionate and it shows. Give this place a go, you won't regret it.
